stylesheet-descriptor.name: DLMTabsColumns
stylesheet-descriptor.description: Presents the DLM layout in terms of tabs and columns

stylesheet-parameter.name: userLayoutRoot
stylesheet-parameter.description: The id of the focused layout element

stylesheet-parameter.name: focusedTabID
stylesheet-parameter.description: The number of the DLM tab that is currently active

stylesheet-parameter.name: defaultTab
stylesheet-parameter.description: The number of the DLM tab that is initially active

layout-attribute.name: name
layout-attribute.description: Allow renaming a folder without having to reload the underlying layout DOM (this seems like a hack)

layout-attribute.name: externalId
layout-attribute.description: Identifier used to reference a tab externally, such as within a URL

layout-attribute.name: tabGroup
layout-attribute.description: Allows the theme to sort tabs into groups (optional feature)
